name: Cannabis Farmer Strain Master
description:
Cannabis Farmer Strain Master is a Marijuana growing simulator game where you will put your master grower skills to test.

  • Grow strains, learn about them, and sell them to local dispensaries.
  • Unlock dozens of different strains (with more to come!) and level up as you grow and sell your way to Strain Master status.
  • Unlock new stores to sell at.
  • Everchanging environmental conditions such as rain that affects plant quality.
  • Use supplements like Mychorize, Sea kelp, organic, chemical fertilizer, and final flush to increase quality of buds.
  • Test your grow skills to reach different quality levels for your plants just like real life growing, meaning higher profit and unlockables!
  • Harvest your plants with a variety of tools including fun things like ninja swords and ninja stars for some added harvesting fun!
  • Different leaf textures, size, height, and shape.
  • 3D spatial sounds immerse you in the grow!
  • Daily Tasks.
  • Earn money selling and unlock extras like bongs at the dispensaries and more to discover!
  • VR Support coming in near future
